phi.spellerror.range: ERROR: The range of this trick is 32 blocks
phi.spellerror.min_wave: ERROR: Psion wave parameters must be at least one
phi.spellerror.no_mpu: ERROR: This trick can only be used in a Magic Processing Unit
phi.spellerror.not_number: ERROR: The provided text doesn't represent a number
phi.redstone_mode.always: §cRedstone Mode§f: Always active, ignore redstone signal
phi.spellpiece.trick_psion_wave.desc: Emits a psion wave. Magicians hit by it will feel dizzy
phi.spellpiece.trick_psi_transfer.desc: Compresses psionic energy into a projectile that can charge Magic Processing Units
phi.spellpiece.trick_shadow.desc: Casts a shadow over a block
phi.spellpiece.trick_shadow_sequence.des: Casts a shadow over multiple blocks in a line
phi.spellpiece.trick_conjure_marker.desc: Conjures a marker visible through walls to the caster and spells. Has an increased range.
phi.spellpiece.trick_move_marker.desc: Moves a marker conjured by the caster. Has an increased range.
phi.spellpiece.trick_caster_blink.desc: Teleports the caster in the given direction
phi.spellpiece.trick_swap_blink.desc: Targets switch place. Targets caster by default
phi.spellpiece.trick_swap_blink_position: Targets switch place, but not look direction. Targets caster by default
phi.spellpiece.trick_blink_eidos_reversa: Teleports the caster back in time
phi.spellpiece.trick_acceleration.desc: Constantly accelerates the target in the given direction for the specified time
phi.spellpiece.trick_mass_acceleration.d: Constantly accelerates the targets in the given direction for the specified time
phi.spellpiece.trick_acceleration_toward: Constantly accelerates the targets towards the given point for the specified time
phi.spellpiece.trick_elastic_anchor.desc: Pulls the targets towards their initial position when the trick was executed for the specified time
phi.spellpiece.trick_place_dropped_block: Places a block from a dropped item
phi.spellpiece.trick_move_spirit.desc: Moves a spirit summoned by the caster. Not limited by range.
phi.spellpiece.trick_focus_spirit.desc: Transfers focus to a spirit summoned by the caster and outputs it. Not limited by range.
phi.spellpiece.trick_defocus_spirit.desc: Returns focus to the original focal point and outputs it.
phi.spellpiece.trick_early_evaluate.desc: Evaluates the target piece early if condition is within (-1, 1) exclusive
phi.spellpiece.trick_reevaluate.desc: Reevaluates the target piece if condition is within (-1, 1) exclusive
phi.spellpiece.trick_save_vector_compone: Saves a number to a component of a saved vector. The vector slot is given by target / 3 rounded up, the component by the remainder of target / 3
phi.spellpiece.trick_write_vector_storag: Writes a vector to a connected Vector Storage Unit. Requires a Magic Processing Unit
Writes text to a connected Text Storage Unit. Requires a Magic Processing Unit
Writes text to a connected Text Display. Overwrites the given line or appends to the bottom of the screen. Requires a Magic Processing Unit
phi.spellpiece.trick_set_comparator_outp: Sets the comparator output of the Magic Processing Unit executing the trick
phi.spellpiece.trick_set_time.desc: Sets the internal time of a Magic Processing Unit
phi.spellpiece.trick_spin_item_chamber.d: Spins the chamber of an item. Negative slot numbers select equipment slots. Selects the next or previous bullet depending on the sign of direction or the given slot number.
phi.spellpiece.selector_nearby_markers.d: Selects markers near the given position. Has an increased range.
phi.spellpiece.selector_nearby_burning.d: Selects burning entities near the given position.
phi.spellpiece.selector_nearby_spirits.d: Selects spirits near the given position.
phi.spellpiece.selector_summoned_spirits: Selects spirits summoned by the caster.
phi.spellpiece.selector_saved_vector_com: Reads a component of a saved vector. The vector slot is given by target / 3 rounded up, the component by the remainder of target / 3
phi.spellpiece.selector_read_vector_stor: Reads a vector from a connected Vector Storage Unit. Requires a Magic Processing Unit
phi.spellpiece.selector_read_text_storag: Reads text from a connected Text Storage Unit. Requires a Magic Processing Unit
phi.spellpiece.selector_spell_name.desc: Reads the name of the spell
phi.spellpiece.selector_caster_speech.de: Gets the last chat message said by the caster
phi.spellpiece.selector_nearby_speech.de: Gets the last chat message said within the range of the MPU
phi.spellpiece.operator_div_mod.desc: Computes both a / b and a %% b
phi.spellpiece.operator_signum_positive_: Returns the sign of the input, treating zero as positive
phi.spellpiece.operator_signum_negative_: Returns the sign of the input, treating zero as negative
phi.spellpiece.operator_extract_digit.de: Extracts a single digit (counting from last, default: 1) from an integer in the given base (default: 10)
phi.spellpiece.operator_replace_digit.de: Replaces a single digit (counting from last, default: 1) in an integer in the given base (default: 10)
phi.spellpiece.operator_defaulted_vector: Constructs a vector, replacing unspecified components with the given default value
phi.spellpiece.operator_vector_component: Also known as the Hadamard product
phi.spellpiece.operator_split_vector.des: Splits a vector to its components
Returns the exact hit position of a raycast
phi.spellpiece.operator_offset_raycast.d: Returns the offset of the hit position of a raycast from the center of the block it hit
phi.spellpiece.operator_nearest_axial_ve: Returns the axial vector the input direction vector is closest to
phi.spellpiece.operator_round_vector.des: Rounds the components of a vector to integers
Removes the decimal places of the components of a vector
phi.spellpiece.operator_clamp_vector.des: Clamps a vector to be under the given magnitude
phi.spellpiece.operator_focused_block.de: Gets the block the target entity is looking at
phi.spellpiece.operator_focused_block_fa: Gets the normal vector of the block face the target entity is looking at
phi.spellpiece.operator_entity_sneak_sta: Selects if the target entity is sneaking (0 if yes, 1 if no)
phi.spellpiece.operator_entity_name.desc: Gets the name of the given entity
phi.spellpiece.operator_entity_eye_posit: Gets the position of the eye of the given entity
phi.spellpiece.operator_entity_foot_posi: Gets the position of the foot of the given entity
phi.spellpiece.operator_text_length.desc: Returns the length of the given text in characters
phi.spellpiece.operator_append_text.desc: Appends pieces of text to each other (doesn't add spaces between)
phi.spellpiece.operator_character_code_a: Gets the code of the Nth character in the given text
phi.spellpiece.operator_character_from_c: Gets the character corresponding to the given code (between 0 and 255)
phi.spellpiece.operator_lower_case.desc: Converts the given text to lower case
phi.spellpiece.operator_upper_case.desc: Converts the given text to upper case
phi.spellpiece.operator_split_text.desc: Splits the given text before the Nth character
phi.spellpiece.operator_split_text_at.de: Splits a text at the first occurence of the given part of said text
phi.spellpiece.operator_number_from_text: Gets the numeric value of a textual number representation
phi.spellpiece.operator_select_text.desc: Selects which text to output based on a condition
phi.spellpiece.operator_hash.desc: Converts its input to incomprehensible gibberish. Seems to output the same number for the same input and different numbers for different inputs
phi.spellpiece.operator_error_catcher.de: Replaces errors with the fallback value and outputs the result. Inline version of the Error Catcher. Multiple copies of the operator can be used on the same target as it doesn't replace its original value
Makes errors passed through it propagate until they are handled by Operator: Handle Error or an Error Catcher
phi.spellpiece.operator_error_status.des: Tests whether its input errored (1 if yes, 0 if no)
phi.spellpiece.connector_clockwise.desc: Redirects inputs to outputs next to them clockwise
phi.spellpiece.connector_counterclockwis: Redirects inputs to outputs next to them counterclockwise
phi.spellpiece.connector_bidirectional.d: Creates a two-way connection between its ends
phi.spellpiece.connector_bridge.desc: Connects to pieces from a distance of two grid cells
phi.spellpiece.constant_text.desc: Select and type to set value
phi.spellpiece.constant_character_code.d: Select and type to set value
phi.spellpiece.constant_vector.desc: Select, press X, Y or Z and type to set coordinate
item.phi.spell_magazine.desc:
§aSpell Magazine§7: A hot swappable alternative to CAD Sockets
Right-click to swap the magazine with the one in your CAD
item.phi.large_spell_magazine.desc: A Spell Magazine with increased capacity
item.phi.huge_spell_magazine.desc: A Spell Magazine with extra-large capacity
item.phi.wide_band_spell_magazine.desc: A cheaper Spell Magazine optimized for high-bandwidth spells
item.phi.increased_storage_spell_magazin: A Spell Magazine with more capacity allocated to vector data storage
item.phi.bulk_storage_spell_magazine.des: A Spell Magazine optimized for storing large amounts of vector data
item.phi.smart_spell_magazine.desc:
A Spell Magazine with a smart selection system to assist in loopcasting spells that span more than one bullet
Automatically reselects the first slot when loopcast ends
item.phi.compound_spell_magazine.desc: A Spell Magazine designed for simultaneous activation of up to 3 spells
item.phi.blood_converter.desc:
§aBlood Converter§7: Improves blood to psi conversion ratio, reducing overflow damage
It doesn't look very safe to use
item.phi.spirit_summoning_talisman.desc: §aSpirit Summoning Talisman§7: Right click to summon spirits. Spells can control summoned spirits regardless of distance.
block.phi.mpu.desc:
§aMagic Processing Unit§7: A block that automatically casts spells
Right click with a spell container to reprogram it
Right click with a redstone torch to configure redstone mode
block.phi.vsu.desc: §aVector Storage Unit§7: A block that stores a vector that can be accessed and modified by adjacent machines or via data cables
block.phi.textsu.desc: §aText Storage Unit§7: A block that stores text that can be accessed and modified by adjacent machines or via data cables. Can store up to 256 characters
block.phi.cad_holder.desc: §aCAD Holder§7: A block that can hold a CAD or Spell Magazine whose contents can be accessed and modified by adjacent machines
block.phi.spell_storage.desc: §aSpell Storage§7: A block that stores spells that can be accessed and modified by adjacent machines. Keeps contents when broken
block.phi.text_display.desc: §aText Display§7: A block that displays text and can be written to by adjacent machines or via data cables
block.phi.spell_display.desc:
§aSpell Display§7: A block that displays a spell
Right click with a spell container to copy the spell
Change spell with an adjacent spell programmer
block.phi.infusion_laser.desc:
§aInfusion Laser§7: A psionic laser that can be used to automate infusing items with psi
Fires automatically when sufficiently charged
Equivalent to Trick: Infusion in terms of power
block.phi.distill_chamber_wall.desc:
§aPsion Distillation Chamber Wall§7: Walls of a psion distillation chamber
Build a 3x3x3-5x5x5 hollow cuboid from these with a Psion Distillation Chamber Controller on one side
block.phi.distill_chamber_controller.des:
§aPsion Distillation Chamber Controller§7: A controller for a psion distillation chamber
Use with Psion Distillation Chamber Walls to create a psion distillation chamber
Input psidust by dropping it in front of the controller
Can store 4 psidust / block (internal volume)
block.phi.psimetal_crusher.desc:
§aPsimetal Crusher§7: A block that crushes psimetal into psidust
Place psimetal ingots under the crusher to crush them
